name: Velvet Pouffe with Burl Plinth
description: Introducing the Velvet Pouffe with Burl Plinth a harmonious blend of opulence and timeless design that exudes luxury and craftsmanship. Handmade in the UK. The super-soft velvet, was an irresistible choice for our design team. The warmth of the velvets hue seamlessly integrates with existing colour schemes, adding a touch of warm colour to a space. The luxurious velvet not only looks divine but also offers a sumptuous feel, inviting you to reach out and touch this tactile piece. The plinth features an authentic Burl veneer showcasing a beautifully knotted and unique wood grain pattern.
